name: Arty-Ficial
description:
WARNING - BEFORE YOU PLAY: I just found out there is a bug in the first THREE rooms, DO NOT press restart in these two rooms or you won't be able to continue (don't worry, those rooms can't get you stuck in any way). I'll probably upload a fixed version when the jam voting is over.

If Arty looks stuck or won't answer to your prompts, call him to yourself so he will get unstuck.

(It was my first time making a WEBGL build so the game has these little issues, when the jam ends i'll also probably upload a downloadable version.)

MADE FOR THE WOWIE JAM 4.0

Escape from the deadly lab with your new companion, Arty, the dumb AI, and help his "mom" to conquer the world!

COMMANDS: 

WASD - Move

SPACE - Jump

LEFT-CLICK - Move Arty

RIGHT-CLICK - Make Arty  Grab/Drop a box

E  - Call Arty back, ignoring all collisions (works even when he has a box)

R - Reset room
